name: BoxItFindIt
0:
”Alexa open box it find it”
”Alexa start box it find it”
”Alexa launch box it find it”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: box it find it
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Have you ever packed up all of your stuff to move or just put items into boxes to store them? And then you forgot which items where in which box? Box It Find It application solves that problem.

Our slogan is: “you box it, and we will find it”.

First you must upload a picture of the contents of a box to https://www.boxitfindit.com.
After you have upload the content picture(s) of your boxes, you are now ready to ask the Alexa app "Box It Find It" to locate your items.

For example,
you: "Alexa, open Box It Find It."
Alexa: Welcome, what can I find for you today?
you: "Alexa, which box did I put my laptop into?"
Alexa: look in box # 3, would you like me to email it to you?
If you say yes, then the picture and the description will be emailed to the email address you have listed in https://www.boxitfindit.com.

OR

you: "Alexa, open Box It Find It."
Alexa: Welcome, what can I find for you today?
you: "Alexa, what is in box 2?"
Alexa: Box #2, would you like me to email it to you?
If you say yes, then the picture and the description will be emailed to to the email address you have listed in https://www.boxitfindit.com.

Check out the Box It Find It demos at https://www.boxitfindit.com/demo
